name: Gun-N-Done
description:
You are an interstellar arms dealer who has suddenly crash landed into the ancient ruins of an extraterrestrial society. Fend off against alien creatures using gun parts from your scattered cargo and obtain the missing parts of your ship to escape!

Using different gun parts will change the speed, ammo count, and bullet type of the finished gun.  It's power is based on the parts you choose. 

Made for JamCraft 5
